author: Rolfe Winkler
title: How Do Pundits Never Get It Wrong? Call a 40% Chance
text:
What are the chances that readers will make it to the end of this article? About 40%.
If you do make it, that prediction will look smart. If you donâ€™t, well, we said the odds were against it.
Such is the nature of the 40% rule, a favorite forecasting tactic of Wall Street analysts and other prognosticators trying to make a bold call without...
